    src/validation/formValidation/resolverDisplayActionInvalid.js

    import resolverDisplayActionSetByValidatorOnly from './resolverDisplayActionSetByValidatorOnly';
/**
 * This function provides validation invalid actions.
 *
 */

export default function resolverDisplayActionInvalid( result, fieldDom, validator, configFeedbackDisplay, feedbackDisplay ) {
    var message = typeof validator.message !== 'undefined' &&
    ( configFeedbackDisplay.preferHTMLValidatorMessage || typeof result.message === 'undefined' ) ? validator.message :
        ( typeof result.message !== 'undefined' ? result.message : '' );

      if ( configFeedbackDisplay.fieldShowState ) {
        feedbackDisplay.setStatus( fieldDom, false, configFeedbackDisplay.fieldIdForAriaUsage );
    } else {
        feedbackDisplay.removeStatus( fieldDom );
    }

    if ( configFeedbackDisplay.messageShow ) {
        feedbackDisplay.showMessage( fieldDom, message,
            configFeedbackDisplay.messageLocation,
            fieldDom.id
        );
    }

    resolverDisplayActionSetByValidatorOnly( feedbackDisplay, configFeedbackDisplay.setByValidatorOnly );
}
